trans-unit.source: Represents a complete, in-memory description of the service, including all the endpoints for the service and specifications for their respective addresses, bindings, contracts and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en fullstendig, i minnet beskrivelse av tjenesten, inkludert alle endepunkter for tjenesten og spesifikasjoner for respektive adresser, bindinger, kontrakter og virkemåter.

trans-unit.source: The information contained in the ServiceDescription is used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] system to building the run-time components for the service.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen i ServiceDescription brukes av den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] systemet for å bygge kjøretid komponentene for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when adding custom behaviors to extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden når du legger til egendefinerte virkemåter for å utvide <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Programmatically, you must <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29> the custom service behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> prior to when you call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object.
trans-unit.target: Programmatisk, må du <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>egendefinerte tjenestevirkemåten til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>før når du kaller den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objektet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29> methods are available to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29>metoder er tilgjengelige for å gjenspeile på virkemåter ved hjelp av den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming modellen når du erstatter <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>med du eier verts mekanisme.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Type%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.GetService%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: Export metadata about a service endpoint by passing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> as a parameter to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.
trans-unit.target: Eksport metadata om endepunktet til en tjeneste ved å sende <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>som en parameter til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, or one of the other export methods provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> property to return the collection of <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: Eksporter metodene som følger med etter du kaller opp denne metoden eller en av de andre <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>, bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A>til å returnere samlingen av <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>objekter.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class from a specified enumeration of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> klassen fra en angitt opplisting av tjenesten endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> used to initialize the service description.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>brukes til å initialisere tjenestebeskrivelsen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: endpoints is .
trans-unit.target: endpointsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the behaviors associated with the service.
trans-unit.target: Henter virkemåter som er knyttet til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when adding custom behaviors to extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden når du legger til egendefinerte virkemåter for å utvide <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Programmatically, you must <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29> the custom service behavior to the Behaviors prior to when you call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object.
trans-unit.target: Et program, må du <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>egendefinerte service-virkemåten for virkemåter før når du kaller den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objektet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%28%600%29>

trans-unit.source: The type of behavior that is accessible from the description hierarchy is scoped to the specific level.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten som er tilgjengelig fra hierarkiet beskrivelse omfattes bestemt nivå.

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> is accessible.
trans-unit.target: Fra den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: If you want access to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> associated with an endpoint instead, you can obtain the endpoints for the service using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>knyttet til et endepunkt i stedet, kan du hente sluttpunkt for tjenesten ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Then retrieve the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> from the collection with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> method that employs the relevant search criteria, and call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> property to obtain the collection of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter deretter den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>fra samlingen med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A>metoden som bruker den relevante søkevilkårene, og kall av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>til å hente samlingen av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>objekter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyedByTypeCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref> that contains the behaviors associated with the service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyedByTypeCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"> </xref> som inneholder virkemåter som er knyttet til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <<xref uid="langword_csharp_service" name="service" href=""></xref>> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på den < <xref uid="langword_csharp_service" name="service" href=""> </xref> > konfigurasjonselementet.

trans-unit.source: This name is not coupled to our configuration model.
trans-unit.target: Dette navnet er ikke koblet våre konfigurasjonen modellen.

trans-unit.source: This is used by service host base to wire up the service.
trans-unit.target: Dette brukes av Tjenesteverten base til å koble deg til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The configuration name is a required string attribute for the [\<service\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjonsnavnet på er et obligatorisk strengattributt for den [ \< tjenesten\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) konfigurasjonselementet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the [\<service\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) configuration element used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den [ \< tjenesten\>](../Topic/%3Cservice%3E.md) konfigurasjonselementet som brukes til å konfigurere tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of endpoints from the service description.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av endepunkt fra tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection> returned by this method each contain the address, binding, contract, and behavior information required to communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: Endepunkt i den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection>returneres av denne metoden hver inneholder adresse, bindingen, kontrakten og virkemåten informasjonen som kreves for å kommunisere med tjenesten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection>

trans-unit.source: To access this information, you must retrieve the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> from the collection with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> method that employs the relevant search criteria.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til denne informasjonen, må du hente det <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>fra samlingen med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A>metoden som bruker de aktuelle søkekriteriene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> properties can be used to access the information.
trans-unit.target: Vil <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>Egenskaper som kan brukes til å få tilgang til informasjon.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>brukes av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Contract%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Export metadata about a service endpoint by passing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> as a parameter to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.
trans-unit.target: Eksport metadata om endepunktet til en tjeneste ved å sende <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>som en parameter til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"></xref> that contains the endpoints defined for the service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection"> </xref> som inneholder endepunkt som er definert for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service description initialized with a specified service object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en tjenestebeskrivelsen initialisert med et angitt serviceobjekt.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden skal gjengi på virkemåter ved hjelp av den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming modellen når du erstatter <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>med du eier verts mekanisme.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: GetService initializes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> properties, and ensures that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> is attached to the service and adds any relevant service behaviors to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer GetService den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A>Egenskaper og sikrer at den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>er knyttet til tjenesten og legger til alle aktuelle virkemåte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that implements the service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som implementerer tjenesten.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> for the service object provided.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> for det angitte serviceobjektet.

trans-unit.source: serviceImplementation is .
trans-unit.target: serviceImplementationis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a service description initialized with a specified service type.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en tjenestebeskrivelsen initialiseres med en angitt tjenestetype.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to reflect on behaviors using the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model when replacing <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> with you own hosting mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden skal gjengi på virkemåter ved hjelp av den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming modellen når du erstatter <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>med du eier verts mekanisme.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: GetService initializes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> properties, reflects on the type for any the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> objects and adds them to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>, and ensures that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> is attached to the service.
trans-unit.target: GetService initialiserer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A>, og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A>Egenskaper gjenspeiler på typen for noen av <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>objekter, og legger dem til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>, og sikrer at den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>er knyttet til tjenesten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.ConfigurationName%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>for tjenesten.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> for the service type provided.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> for den angitte tjenestetypen.

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the service.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: If the name is `null`, this property returns the name of the service type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis navnet `null`, returnerer navnet på tjenestetypen for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: If service type is also `null`, it returns the default service name.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tjenestetypen også `null`, returneres tjenestenavnet som standard.

trans-unit.source: When exporting WSDL metadata, the Name maps to the Web Service Development Language (WSDL) <`service`> element local name part of the (qualified) `name` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når du eksporterer WSDL-metadata, navnet tilordnes til Web Service utvikling språket (WSDL) `service`> elementet lokalt navn en del av den (banen) `name` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the service.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace for the service.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navneområdet for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: When exporting WSDL metadata, the Namespacemaps to the Web Service Development Language (WSDL) <`service`> element namespace name part of the (qualified) `name` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når du eksporterer WSDL-metadata, Namespacemaps til Web Service utvikling språket (WSDL) `service`> elementet navneområde navn en del av den (banen) `name` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the service.
trans-unit.target: Navneområdet for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the service.
trans-unit.target: Henter av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Type> that implements the service.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den <xref:System.Type>som implementerer tjenesten.</xref:System.Type>
